title: En Vaanam Neethana Lyrics Dhinamthorum
stanzas:
En vaanam neethaana
adhil nilavum neethaana
vinmeengal yaavum
neethaanaa

en ninaivum neethaana
varum kanavum neethaana
en vazhvin jeevan neethaana

Eeram maana
oru sol podhumadi
kadhal endu sol

vedhamaaga un per aandhai
mouna nenjathil
geethamaaga maarida
thonuthadi vaarthaiyindri ponen

thendralodu selai
ennai pattri pesaadhaa
pesum podhum engum
kadhal vaasam veesaathaa

unnai thandha naalalil
ennil pookkal pookkum anbe
kaaindha mannil mazhaiyaaga
vaa vaa kannae

aanandham neethaan endru
kanden penne
unai imaiyaamal paarkum
aaval konden penne

En vaanam neethaana
adhil nilavum neethaana
vinmeengal yaavum
neethaanaa

en ninaivum neethaana
varum kanavum neethaana
en vazhvin jeevan neethaana
